item.description: Hello, my name is: mikepatx I am a mild mannered architect in the security space, passionate about bug bounty, infosec, and generally all things tech. Current me: In my day life, I lead the Security Solutions Architecture team at Bugcrowd. I have been on the Bugcrowd team since 2019. Outside of work I love to research interesting security topics, and love playing video games, specially older CRPGs like Neverwinter Nights. I live on the coast with my wife, toddler, and two dogs.
